summary:
### December 2025 Summary for BuidlGuidl/SpeedRunEthereum-v2

- **Major Features/Improvements:**
  - Updated references from "staking" to "crowdfunding" and rebranded "SpeedRunEthereum" to "Speedrun Ethereum" in PR #349.
  - Added a "Completed by" metric on the challenge page to enhance user experience (PR #347).
  
- **Bug Fixes:**
  - Addressed security vulnerabilities in React and Next.js related to CVE-2025-55184 and CVE-2025-55183 (PR #348).
  - Upgraded to a fixed version of Next.js to resolve CVE-2025-66478 (PR #346).

- **Overall Themes:**
  - Focus on security updates and enhancements to the user interface.
  - Consistent rebranding efforts to improve clarity and user engagement.

topPRs.title: staking >> crowdfunding and some more SpeedRunEthereum >> Speedrun Ethereum
Fix react and next CVE-2025-55184 and CVE-2025-55183
